arcs.headline: Seamless OpenClaw Integration
arcs.summary: We've rolled out a complete integration suite for OpenClaw agents. This includes a new landing page, a streamlined setup script that handles installation and onboarding in a single command, and a UI refresh with consistent branding.

one_liner: All eyes on OpenClaw today with a new landing page, single-command setup, and fresh branding.
pr_summary:
TODAY'S UPDATES (3 merged PRs):
- #8165: feat: OpenClaw integration — landing page, setup script, docs
- #8167: feat: auto-install OpenClaw and auto-onboard in setup script
- #8168: fix: OpenClaw branding — favicon, logos, fonts
